Dr. Reddy's Laboratories Stock Split: Record Date Fixed! Dr. Reddy's Laboratories Stock Split: Record Date Fixed! Dr. Reddy's Laboratories has set October 28, 2024, as the record date for the 1:5 stock split of its equity shares. This means that for every one share of Dr. Reddy's that an investor owns, they will receive an additional four shares. This action by the company can lead to increased liquidity and make the stock more accessible to a wider range of investors.

DRREDDY Share Price Insights

DRREDDY Analyst Ratings & Predictions

In the year ending March 31, 2025, Dr. Reddy's spent less than 1% of operating revenues on interest expenses and 17.09% on employee costs.

A "buy" signal was indicated by a 10-day moving crossover on August 29, 2025, which has historically shown an average price gain of 1.97% within 7 days over the last five years.

The DRREDDY share price saw a slight increase of 0.03% from its previous closing price of Rs 1,259.80, with the last traded price being 1,260.10.

Based on analysis from 3 analysts, Dr. Reddy's (RDY) has a consensus "Buy" rating.

The recommendations include 33% Strong Buy, 33% Buy, 0% Hold, 33% Sell, and 0% Strong Sell.

Analyst ratings, predictions, and price targets for RDY stock in 2025 are available.
